text:
="preserve">Captain D's is an American seafood restaurant company. They make fish, shrimp and fries. Captain D's was established in 1969 in Tennessee.
Captain D's is in many states, including Virginia, Texas, Illinois, Missouri, Georgia, Arkansas and Alabama.
In 2015, Captain D's had record-breaking success. The success came from its seafood expertise and product innovation. It introduced new menu items, such as Creamy Shrimp Scampi, Homestyle Fish Tenders and Crusted Tilapia.
